Sure, here is an outline on selling using the Challenger Model of Value Based selling:

I. Introduction

* Briefly explain the concept of value-based selling
* Introduce the Challenger Model of Value Based selling

II. The Challenger Model

* Define the five types of sales reps
* Explain the characteristics of the Challenger sales rep

III. Understanding the Customer

* Discuss the importance of understanding the customer's needs and goals
* Explain the Challenger sales rep's approach to understanding the customer

IV. Teaching for differentiation

* Discuss the importance of differentiation in selling
* Explain the Challenger sales rep's approach to teaching customers about differentiation

V. Tailoring for resonance

* Discuss the importance of tailoring the sales message to the customer
* Explain the Challenger sales rep's approach to tailoring the sales message

VI. Taking control of the sale

* Discuss the importance of taking control of the sale
* Explain the Challenger sales rep's approach to taking control

VII. Conclusion

* Summarize the key points of the Challenger Model of Value Based selling
* Emphasize the importance of adding value for the customer in the sales process
